gw.api.tools

Class LoadIntegrityChecksHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.AbstractPageHelperImpl
      • gw.api.tools.LoadIntegrityChecksHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageHelper

    public class LoadIntegrityChecksHelper
extends AbstractPageHelperImpl
    Supports the display of integrity checks that would be done when doing table-base imports.
    Author:
    wclark
